prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan confess that he has romantic feelings for me, if so, when?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Understood, Melissa. I'll analyze the horary chart using traditional horary principles, focusing on the aspects and elements relevant to your question about Stefan confessing romantic feelings. I'll list the key chart data for interpretation, and then you can document them for further analysis.

Key Chart Data for Interpretation:

1. Ascendant (You): 29°15' Cancer
2. 9th House cusp (Stefan): 13° Pisces
3. Venus (natural significator of love): 1°07' Aries in 9th House
4. Moon (co-significator): 24°29' Taurus in 11th House
5. Jupiter (ruler of 9th House/Stefan): 11°16' Gemini in 11th House
6. Saturn (exalted in Libra, Stefan's 4th House): 17°57' Pisces in 9th House

Aspects and Patterns:

1. Venus conjunct North Node (orb: 2°)
2. Venus trine Ascendant (orb: 2°)
3. Moon sextile Neptune (orb: 4°)
4. Moon sextile Ascendant (orb: 5°)
5. Jupiter trine Mercury (orb: 3°)
6. Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 6°)

Notable Features:

1. Venus in Aries in the 9th House (Stefan's 12th House)
2. Moon in Taurus in the 11th House (Stefan's 2nd House)
3. Jupiter in Gemini in the 11th House (Stefan's 2nd House)
4. Saturn in Pisces in the 9th House (Stefan's 12th House)
5. Waxing Gibbous Moon phase

These are the key elements from the horary chart that are most relevant to your question about Stefan confessing romantic feelings. Please document these for further interpretation, and let me know if you need any clarification or additional information before we proceed with the analysis.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a list of all relevant chart data drawn directly from your horary chart using traditional horary principles. This summary focuses on planetary positions, house placements, critical aspects, and identified patterns—all of which will serve as a foundation for later interpretation regarding Stefan’s confession.

1. Planetary Positions (with their degrees, signs, and associated houses as provided):
• Sun: 17° 19′ Aquarius
• Moon: 24° 29′ Taurus
• Mercury: 14° 39′ Aquarius
• Venus: 1° 7′ Aries
• Mars (r): 19° 9′ Cancer
• Jupiter: 11° 16′ Gemini
• Saturn: 17° 57′ Pisces
• Uranus: 23° 16′ Taurus
• Neptune: 28° 6′ Pisces
• Pluto: 2° 12′ Aquarius
• North Node (r): 29° 35′ Pisces
• Chiron: 19° 39′ Aries

2. House Cusps (as provided; note the positions of key houses for the query):
• Ascendant (Querent – Melissa): 29° Cancer
• 6th House (by the cross‐reference, Stefan’s 9th house): Starts at 1° Capricorn (no planets listed directly in this house)
• 7th House: Starts at 29° Capricorn (contains Sun, Mercury, Pluto per provided details)
• 9th House: Starts at 13° Pisces (contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node)
• 10th House: Starts at 12° Aries (contains Chiron)
• 11th House: Starts at 22° Taurus (contains Moon, Jupiter, Uranus)
• 12th House: Starts at 1° Cancer (contains Mars)

3. Key Aspects (with orbs as provided):
• Mars Square Chiron (orb: 0°)
• MC Opposition IC (orb: 0°)
• North Node Trine Ascendant (orb: 0°)
• Jupiter Sextile MC (orb: 1°)
• Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 1°)
• Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
• Moon Conjunction Uranus (orb: 1°)
• Neptune Trine Ascendant (orb: 1°)
• Jupiter Trine IC (orb: 1°)
• Mercury Sextile MC (orb: 2°)
• Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 2°)
• Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 2°)
• Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
• Venus Trine Ascendant (orb: 2°)
• Mercury Trine IC (orb: 2°)
• Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
• Pluto Opposition Ascendant (orb: 3°)
• Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 3°)
• Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 3°)
• Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 3°)
• Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
• Moon Sextile Neptune (orb: 4°)
• Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
• Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb: 5°)
• Moon Sextile Ascendant (orb: 5°)
• Moon Sextile Mars (orb: 5°)
• Sun Sextile MC (orb: 5°)
• Sun Trine IC (orb: 5°)
• Uranus Sextile Ascendant (orb: 6°)
• Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
• Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 6°)
• Sun Square Uranus (orb: 6°)
• Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 6°)
• Mars Square IC (orb: 7°)
• Mars Square MC (orb: 7°)
• Sun Square Moon (orb: 7°)
• Chiron Opposition IC (orb: 7°)
• Chiron Conjunction MC (orb: 7°)
• Moon Trine Pluto (orb: 8°)

4. Identified Patterns:
• Grand Trine: Involving Sun (17° Aquarius), IC (12° Libra), Jupiter (11° Gemini), and Mercury (14° Aquarius)
• Kite Formation: Combining the Grand Trine with MC in Aries; key elements include Sun in Aquarius, IC in Libra, Jupiter in Gemini, Mercury in Aquarius, and MC at 12° Aries
• T-Square: Formed by MC in Aries, Mars in Cancer, IC in Libra, and Chiron in Aries

5. Specific Horary Considerations for the Query:
• Querent (Melissa) is represented by the Ascendant in 29° Cancer. The lord of the Ascendant (with Cancer as its sign) is traditionally the Moon. The Moon is placed in Taurus (24° 29′) in the 11th House, which may be examined for its relationships and reception of aspects.
• Stefan is designated by the foreign/9th-house branch. According to the cross-reference provided, his representation is drawn from the Ascendant’s 6th House. With the 6th House starting at 1° Capricorn, its ruling sign (Capricorn) is governed by Saturn. In this chart, Saturn appears in Pisces (17° 57′) within the 9th House. Also within the 9th House are Venus, Neptune, and the North Node—all factors that may be taken into account in outlining Stefan’s significance in the issue.
• Timing indicators (such as condition of the Moon, aspects involving the significators, and the configuration of the Grand Trine, Kite, and T-Square) are noted for later evaluation in relation to the query’s timeframe.

This collection of data—including the precise positions, house rulerships through the cross-reference guide, aspects, and patterns—forms the complete set of chart details for further interpretive work regarding whether and when Stefan may confess his romantic feelings.

• Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 2°)
• Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 2°)
• Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
• Venus Trine Ascendant (orb: 2°)
• Mercury Trine IC (orb: 2°)
• Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
• Pluto Opposition Ascendant (orb: 3°)
• Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 3°)
• Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 3°)
• Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 3°)
• Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
• Moon Sextile Neptune (orb: 4°)
• Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
• Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb: 5°)
• Moon Sextile Ascendant (orb: 5°)
• Moon Sextile Mars (orb: 5°)
• Sun Sextile MC (orb: 5°)
• Sun Trine IC (orb: 5°)
• Uranus Sextile Ascendant (orb: 6°)
• Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
• Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 6°)
• Sun Square Uranus (orb: 6°)
• Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 6°)
• Mars Square IC (orb: 7°)
• Mars Square MC (orb: 7°)
• Sun Square Moon (orb: 7°)
• Chiron Opposition IC (orb: 7°)
• Chiron Conjunction MC (orb: 7°)
• Moon Trine Pluto (orb: 8°)

4. Identified Patterns:
• Grand Trine: Involving Sun (17° Aquarius), IC (12° Libra), Jupiter (11° Gemini), and Mercury (14° Aquarius)
• Kite Formation: Combining the Grand Trine with MC in Aries; key elements include Sun in Aquarius, IC in Libra, Jupiter in Gemini, Mercury in Aquarius, and MC at 12° Aries
• T-Square: Formed by MC in Aries, Mars in Cancer, IC in Libra, and Chiron in Aries

5. Specific Horary Considerations for the Query:
• Querent (Melissa) is represented by the Ascendant in 29° Cancer. The lord of the Ascendant (with Cancer as its sign) is traditionally the Moon. The Moon is placed in Taurus (24° 29′) in the 11th House, which may be examined for its relationships and reception of aspects.
• Stefan is designated by the foreign/9th-house branch. According to the cross-reference provided, his representation is drawn from the Ascendant’s 6th House. With the 6th House starting at 1° Capricorn, its ruling sign (Capricorn) is governed by Saturn. In this chart, Saturn appears in Pisces (17° 57′) within the 9th House. Also within the 9th House are Venus, Neptune, and the North Node—all factors that may be taken into account in outlining Stefan’s significance in the issue.
• Timing indicators (such as condition of the Moon, aspects involving the significators, and the configuration of the Grand Trine, Kite, and T-Square) are noted for later evaluation in relation to the query’s timeframe.

This collection of data—including the precise positions, house rulerships through the cross-reference guide, aspects, and patterns—forms the complete set of chart details for further interpretive work regarding whether and when Stefan may confess his romantic feelings.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the horary chart data, I note the following:

• The querent’s significator is the Moon (ruler of Cancer), placed in Taurus in the 11th House. Its stable placement in Taurus, along with its close conjunction to Uranus, suggests unexpected yet deeply felt motivations and messages from the social sphere.

• Stefan’s association is indicated via the 9th House branch; its ruler, Saturn, appears in Pisces along with Venus, Neptune, and the North Node. Venus and Neptune here imbue the matter with potent romantic energy and a fated sense of connection. The North Node’s influence further emphasizes that this situation carries a sense of destiny, despite Saturn’s natural tendency to delay or restrict.

• Key aspects support a brewing revelation. Venus forms a supportive sextile with Pluto, adding intensity to the romantic quality, while Venus’s conjunction with Neptune and the North Node reinforces the destined, if nontraditional, nature of the attraction. Meanwhile, the Moon’s aspects—most notably its conjunction with Uranus and the sextiles drawn to the Ascendant—point to sudden breakthroughs and an impending, if disruptive, communication.

• The interplay of the Grand Trine (linking the Sun, Mercury, Jupiter, and the IC) and the Kite formation (with the MC in Aries) indicates that circumstances exist which will activate communication and public expression. However, the T-Square involving Mars (in Cancer), Chiron, and the IC/MC indicates tension—a struggle between personal impulses and the constraints imposed by duty or circumstance. This tension may cause delays until a catalyst, perhaps a transit affecting Mars or Saturn, eases the inherent friction.

• In practical terms, the chart suggests that Stefan’s underlying romantic feelings are indeed active. The presence of Venus, Neptune, and the North Node in his branch indicate a clear, though hidden, affection. However, the delay inherent in Saturn’s placement on the 9th means that while the feelings are strong, the confession may be postponed by external or internal pressures.

• Timing indicators point to a window when transiting influences (especially those impacting Mars and Saturn) might relieve the tension of the T-Square. When Mars—representing sudden initiations—activates relevant natal positions (particularly if transiting aspects approach the natal Mars in Cancer or Saturn in Pisces), it may trigger his break in reticence. An expected period of activation may arise within the next couple of weeks, assuming that no intervening factors disrupt the alignment.

Based on these chart elements, the indication is that Stefan will eventually confess his romantic feelings, but the timing relies on an external trigger that alleviates Saturn’s inhibitions and dissolves the tension of the T-Square. The energies suggest a breakthrough may occur in the near future, potentially within a window of days to a couple of weeks—when transient activations align to permit the confession.

Please provide any further data or ask for clarification on specific details if needed.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Can you tell me what to look for in a transit chart? I mean, specifically, what exactly would be the most top three favorable conditions that I should watch for on a daily transit.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Melissa, here are three top transit conditions to monitor on a daily basis that may favor a breakthrough in romantic developments:

1. Mars in Action – When Mars makes a positive aspect (trine, sextile, or conjunction) to your personal significators (such as the Moon or Ascendant), it fuels initiative and the courage to act, thereby signifying a potential moment of revelation.

2. Venus in Alignment – A transit of Venus forming a harmonious aspect with your Ascendant or Moon brings supportive love energy and increased attractiveness. This alignment can indicate favorable conditions for romantic expressions and emotional connections.

3. Jupiter’s Expansive Influence – When Jupiter transits key points in your chart (especially in aspect to the Ascendant, Moon, or other personal planets), it signals growth, opportunity, and relief from earlier constraints, which may open up chances for confession and clear communication.

These conditions are especially important for daily observations as they may present the most auspicious moments for energetic and emotional shifts in your situation.
